abstract: After years of insisting on standard pricing for digital downloads, Apple is apparently ready to acknowledge that not all television shows are created equal.
snippet: After years of insisting on standard pricing for digital downloads, Apple is apparently ready to acknowledge that not all television shows are created equal.
lead_paragraph: After years of insisting on standard pricing for digital downloads, Apple is apparently ready to acknowledge that not all television shows are created equal.

headline.main: The Price of HBO on iTunes: $1.99+

abstract: The higher pricing for some HBO shows is a departure for Apple which for years has insisted on standard pricing for digital downloads, at $1.99.
snippet: The higher pricing for some HBO shows is a departure for Apple which for years has insisted on standard pricing for digital downloads, at $1.99.
lead_paragraph: After years of insisting on standard pricing for digital downloads, Apple is apparently ready to acknowledge that not all television shows are created equal.

headline.main: HBO Shows May Sell on iTunes, for $1.99+
headline.print_headline: HBO Shows May Sell On iTunes For $1.99+
